qas.question: A partially full frame's ability to have part of the next frame's audio data is referred to as what?

context: <a1_0>Layer III<a1_0/> audio can also use a "<a0_0>bit reservoir<a0_0/>", a partially full frame's ability to hold part of the next frame's audio data, allowing <a2_0>temporary<a2_0/> changes in effective bitrate, even in a <a4_0>constant bitrate<a4_0/> stream. Internal handling of the bit reservoir increases <a3_0>encoding delay<a3_0/>.[citation needed]
